pages.title: Corrupted Lich
pages.text: Level: <level_t2>$(br2)Spawns in $(copy:Lich Prison)Lich Prison$()[$(copy:graveyard:lich_prison)graveyard:lich_prison$()].$(br)You can locate this structure in the $(bold)Overworld$() using $(mage/spell#locate)Spell Locate$().$(br2)To summon the $(key)Corrupted Lich$(), you need a $(key)Vial of Blood$() and $(key)Ominous Bone Staff Fragments$().

$(br)With a $(key)Bone Dagger$() in your main hand and an empty $(key)Glass Bottle$() or a partially filled $(key)Vial of Blood$() in your offhand, killing a $(key)Zombie$() or $(key)Villager$() increases the blood in the bottle by $(bold)1/8$(). The $(key)Vial of Blood$() must be full to summon the $(key)Corrupted Lich$().

$(br)These can be crafted from $(key)Mutant Skeleton$() drops, or found in $(copy:Ruins)Ruins$()[$(copy:graveyard:ruins)graveyard:ruins$()].$(br)You can locate this structure in the $(bold)Overworld$() using $(mage/spell#locate)Spell Locate$().

pages.title: Summoning the Corrupted Lich
pages.text: $(br)At $(bold)night$(), place the $(bold)3$() $(key)Ominous Bone Staff Fragments$() (upper/middle/lower) from left to right on the $(key)Cracked Deepslate Center$() in front of the altar. Then pour the blood from the $(key)Vial of Blood$() onto the $(key)Altar$() block at the center of the floating island to summon the $(key)Corrupted Lich$().
